    public class CzechPreprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPreprocessor
    This class was taken and modified from the second practical of the KIV/IR module. The original code can be found at https://github.com/dundalek/czech-stemmer

    • Method Detail

      • tokenize

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokenize​(java.lang.String text)
        Description copied from interface: IPreprocessor
        Preprocesses a piece of give text. The process involves lowercasing, tokenizing, getting rid of stopwords, and stemming.
        Specified by:
        tokenize in interface IPreprocessor
        Parameters:
        text - piece of text (document) to be preprocessed
        Returns:
        a list of preprocessed terms found in the document

      • preprocess

        public java.lang.String preprocess​(java.lang.String token)
        Description copied from interface: IPreprocessor
        Preprocesses a given token. The token gets converted into lowercase and using PorterStemmer, it gets stemmed as well.
        Specified by:
        preprocess in interface IPreprocessor
        Parameters:
        token - token to be preprocessed
        Returns:
        preprocessed token (term)
